languages.text: {n}Ториана Гапрак вздергивает подбородок — все ее тело дрожит не то от ужаса, не то от гнева.{/n} "Власть фон Валанциус жестока, но несомненна. Торговый Патент дает Вольному Торговцу права превыше тех, коими довольствуются все в этом Дворце. Род Гапрак верен Вольному Торговцу".
languages.translation_comment: Ториана Гапрак — если Гапраки были наказаны и если Ториана жива
Ториана Гапрак — если Гапраки были наказаны и если Ториана жива

languages.text: {n}Toriana Gaprak juts out her chin, her whole body trembling with either terror or anger.{/n} "Von Valancius's power is cruel, but unquestionable. The Warrant of Trade grants the Rogue Trader rights far beyond those that anyone else in this Palace must content themselves with. House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: {n}Ториана Гапрак вздергивает подбородок — все ее тело дрожит не то от ужаса, не то от гнева.{/n} "Власть фон Валанциус жестока, но несомненна. Торговый Патент дает Вольному Торговцу права превыше тех, коими довольствуются все в этом Дворце. Род Гапрак верен Вольному Торговцу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak juts out her chin, her whole body trembling with either terror or anger.{/n} "Von Valancius's power is cruel, but unquestionable. The Warrant of Trade grants the Rogue Trader rights far beyond those that would satisfy anyone in this Palace. House Gaprak is loyal to the Lord Captain."

{n}Toriana Gaprak juts out her chin, her whole body trembling with either terror or anger.{/n} "Von Valancius's power is cruel, but unquestionable. The Warrant of Trade grants the Rogue Trader rights far beyond those that would satisfy anyone in this Palace. House Gaprak is loyal to the Lord Captain."

The Warrant of Trade grants the Rogue Trader rights far beyond those that would satisfy anyone in this Palace. House Gaprak is loyal to the Lord Captain."

{n}Toriana Gaprak juts out her chin, her whole body trembling with either terror or anger.{/n} "Von Valancius's power is cruel, but unquestionable. The Warrant of Trade grants the Rogue Trader rights far beyond those that anyone else in this Palace must content themselves with. House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

{n}Toriana Gaprak juts out her chin, her whole body trembling with either terror or anger.{/n} "Von Valancius's power is cruel, but unquestionable. The Warrant of Trade grants the Rogue Trader rights far beyond those that anyone else in this Palace must content themselves with. House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

languages.text: {n}Toriana Gaprak reckt ihr Kinn, während sie aus Wut oder Angst am ganzen Leib zittert.{/n} "Die Herrschaft derer von Valancius ist grausam aber unbestreitbar. Der Handelsbrief räumt {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} Rechte ein, die weit über das hinausgehen, womit sich jeder andere in diesem Palast begnügen muss. Haus Gaprak ist {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} treu ergeben."
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak juts out her chin, her whole body trembling with either terror or anger.{/n} "Von Valancius's power is cruel, but unquestionable. The Warrant of Trade grants the Rogue Trader rights far beyond those that anyone else in this Palace must content themselves with. House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak reckt ihr Kinn, während sie aus Wut oder Angst am ganzen Leib zittert.{/n} "Die Herrschaft derer von Valancius ist grausam aber unbestreitbar. Der Handelsbrief räumt {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} Rechte ein, die weit über das hinausgehen, womit sich jeder andere in diesem Palast begnügen muss. Haus Gaprak ist {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} treu ergeben."

languages.text: {n}Toriana Gaprak lève le menton, non sans trembler de tout son corps sous l'effet de la terreur ou de la colère.{/n} « Le pouvoir des von Valancius est cruel, mais incontestable. La lettre de marque confère {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} des droits bien plus importants que ceux auxquels peuvent prétendre les occupants de ce palais. La maison Gaprak est loyale {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak juts out her chin, her whole body trembling with either terror or anger.{/n} "Von Valancius's power is cruel, but unquestionable. The Warrant of Trade grants the Rogue Trader rights far beyond those that anyone else in this Palace must content themselves with. House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak lève le menton, non sans trembler de tout son corps sous l'effet de la terreur ou de la colère.{/n} « Le pouvoir des von Valancius est cruel, mais incontestable. La lettre de marque confère {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} des droits bien plus importants que ceux auxquels peuvent prétendre les occupants de ce palais. La maison Gaprak est loyale {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: {n}托丽安娜·贾帕克仰着头，整个人颤抖着，或许是由于恐惧，也或许是出于愤怒。{/n}“尽管冯·瓦兰修斯家族的权力残忍无情，但真实性不容置疑。神圣的贸易授状赋予了行商浪人尊贵的特权，远远超出了这座大殿里其他人的想象。贾帕克家族愿对行商浪人效忠。”
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak juts out her chin, her whole body trembling with either terror or anger.{/n} "Von Valancius's power is cruel, but unquestionable. The Warrant of Trade grants the Rogue Trader rights far beyond those that anyone else in this Palace must content themselves with. House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}托丽安娜·贾帕克仰着头，整个人颤抖着，或许是由于恐惧，也或许是出于愤怒。{/n}“尽管冯·瓦兰修斯家族的权力残忍无情，但真实性不容置疑。神圣的贸易授状赋予了行商浪人尊贵的特权，远远超出了这座大殿里其他人的想象。贾帕克家族愿对行商浪人效忠。”

languages.text: {n}Toriana Gaprak echa la barbilla hacia delante y tiembla de forma incontrolable, o de terror o de ira.{/n} «El poder de von Valancius es cruel, pero incuestionable. La Patente de Comercio otorga a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente derechos muy superiores a los de ninguno de los presentes en este Palacio. La casa Gaprak es leal a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak juts out her chin, her whole body trembling with either terror or anger.{/n} "Von Valancius's power is cruel, but unquestionable. The Warrant of Trade grants the Rogue Trader rights far beyond those that anyone else in this Palace must content themselves with. House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak echa la barbilla hacia delante y tiembla de forma incontrolable, o de terror o de ira.{/n} «El poder de von Valancius es cruel, pero incuestionable. La Patente de Comercio otorga a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente derechos muy superiores a los de ninguno de los presentes en este Palacio. La casa Gaprak es leal a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: {n}トリアーナ・ギャプラックは顎を突き出し、恐怖か怒りかで、全身を震わせながら言った。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウスの権力は冷酷ですが、疑いようがありません。通商令状は、司法宮の誰よりもはるかに大きな権限をローグトレーダーに与えるものです。ギャプラック家はローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓います」
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak juts out her chin, her whole body trembling with either terror or anger.{/n} "Von Valancius's power is cruel, but unquestionable. The Warrant of Trade grants the Rogue Trader rights far beyond those that anyone else in this Palace must content themselves with. House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}トリアーナ・ギャプラックは顎を突き出し、恐怖か怒りかで、全身を震わせながら言った。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウスの権力は冷酷ですが、疑いようがありません。通商令状は、司法宮の誰よりもはるかに大きな権限をローグトレーダーに与えるものです。ギャプラック家はローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓います」

languages.text: {n}Toriana Gaprak; vücudu ya korkudan ya da öfkeden titrer hâlde, hışımla başını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Von Valanciusların gücü amansız fakat sorgulanamazdır. Ticari Ruhsatname'nin Hür Tacir'e bahşettiği haklar, bu Saray'daki kimsenin tahayyül dahi edemeyeceği ölçüdedir. Gaprak Hanesi, Hür Tacir'e sadıktır."
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak juts out her chin, her whole body trembling with either terror or anger.{/n} "Von Valancius's power is cruel, but unquestionable. The Warrant of Trade grants the Rogue Trader rights far beyond those that anyone else in this Palace must content themselves with. House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak; vücudu ya korkudan ya da öfkeden titrer hâlde, hışımla başını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Von Valancius'un gücü amansız fakat sorgulanamazdır. Ticari Ruhsatname'nin Hür Tacir'e bahşettiği haklar, bu Saray'daki kimsenin tahayyül dahi edemeyeceği ölçüdedir. Gaprak Hanesi, Hür Tacir'e sadıktır."
